exceptions.exn: In environment A : lattice x : A Unable to unify "x" with "lat_bot".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
A: lattice
x: Poset.sort tp

Goal:
lat_bot <== x

Premises:
CPO.sort = fun t : cpo => let (sort, _, _) := t in sort : cpo -> Type CPO.sort is a coercion
Notation Poset T m := (Poset.pack id)
lat_bot = lbot : A
lat_lim = fun s : chain tp => sup s : chain tp -> A
Poset.sort = fun t : poset => let (sort, _, _) := t in sort : poset -> Type Poset.sort is a coercion
Record ideal (T : poset) (P : T) : Type := Ideal { id_val : Poset.sort T; id_pf : id_val <== P } Arguments ideal [T] Arguments Ideal [T P id_val]
Record mixin_of (T : poset) : Type := Mixin { mx_bot : Poset.sort T; mx_lim : chain T -> T; _ : forall x : T, mx_bot <== x; _ : forall (s : chain T) (x : T), x \In s -> x <== mx_lim s; _ : forall (s : chain T) (x : T), (forall y : T, y \In s -> y <== x) -> mx_lim s <== x } Arguments CPO.Mixin [T mx_bot] [mx_lim]%function_scope (_ _ _)%function_scope
poset_trans : forall (T : poset) (y x z : T), x <== y -> y <== z -> x <== z
relaxP : forall (T : poset) (P1 P2 : T), P1 <== P2 -> forall p : T, p <== P1 -> p <== P2
poset_asym : forall (T : poset) (x y : T), x <== y -> y <== x -> x = y
prop_limM : forall (s : chain [posetofProp]) (p : [posetofProp]), (forall q : [posetofProp], q \In s -> q <== p) -> prop_lim s <== p
prop_supM : forall (s : Pred Prop) (p : propPoset), (forall q : Prop, q \In s -> q <== p) -> prop_sup s <== p
prop_botP : forall x : [posetofProp], prop_bot <== x
proj1_mono = fun (T1 T2 : poset) (_top_assumption_ : pairPoset T1 T2) => (fun _evar_0_ : forall (a : T1) (b : T2), (fun p : T1 * T2 => forall y : pairPoset T1 T2, p <== y -> p.1 <== y.1) (a, b) => let (x, x0) as p return ((fun p0 : T1 * T2 => forall y : pairPoset T1 T2, p0 <== y -> p0.1 <== y.1) p) := _top_assumption_ in _evar_0_ x x0) (fun (x1 : T1) (x2 : T2) (__top_assumption_ : pairPoset T1 T2) => (fun _evar_0_ : forall (a : T1) (b : T2), (fun p : T1 * T2 => (x1...
infM : forall (T : lattice) (s : Pred_Class) (x : T), (forall y : T, y \In s -> x <== y) -> x <== inf s
proj2_mono = fun (T1 T2 : poset) (_top_assumption_ : pairPoset T1 T2) => (fun _evar_0_ : forall (a : T1) (b : T2), (fun p : T1 * T2 => forall y : pairPoset T1 T2, p <== y -> p.2 <== y.2) (a, b) => let (x, x0) as p return ((fun p0 : T1 * T2 => forall y : pairPoset T1 T2, p0 <== y -> p0.2 <== y.2) p) := _top_assumption_ in _evar_0_ x x0) (fun (x1 : T1) (x2 : T2) (__top_assumption_ : pairPoset T1 T2) => (fun _evar_0_ : forall (a : T1) (b : T2), (fun p : T1 * T2 => (x1...
supM : forall (T : lattice) (s : Pred T) (x : T), (forall y : T, y \In s -> y <== x) -> sup s <== x
limM : forall (D : cpo) (s : chain D) (x : D), (forall y : D, y \In s -> y <== x) -> lim s <== x
CPOMixin : forall (T : poset) (mx_bot : T) (mx_lim : chain T -> T), (forall x : T, mx_bot <== x) -> (forall (s : chain T) (x : T), x \In s -> x <== mx_lim s) -> (forall (s : chain T) (x : T), (forall y : T, y \In s -> y <== x) -> mx_lim s <== x) -> CPO.mixin_of T
poset_refl : forall (T : poset) (x : T), x <== x
botP : forall (D : cpo) (x : D), bot <== x
LatticeMixin : forall (T : poset) (mx_sup : Pred T -> T), (forall (s : Pred T) (x : T), x \In s -> x <== mx_sup s) -> (forall (s : Pred T) (x : T), (forall y : T, y \In s -> y <== x) -> mx_sup s <== x) -> Lattice.mixin_of T
ideal_supM : forall (T : lattice) (P : T) (s : Pred (ideal P)) (p : idealPoset P), (forall q : ideal P, q \In s -> q <== p) -> ideal_sup s <== p
pair_limM : forall (A B : cpo) (s : chain [posetofA * B]) (x : [posetofA * B]), (forall y : [posetofA * B], y \In s -> y <== x) -> pair_lim s <== x
pair_supM : forall (A B : lattice) (s : Pred (A * B)) (p : A * B), (forall q : A * B, q \In s -> q <== p) -> pair_sup s <== p
prod_mono = fun (S1 S2 T1 T2 : poset) (f1 : S1 -> T1) (f2 : S2 -> T2) (M1 : monotone f1) (M2 : monotone f2) (__top_assumption_ : pairPoset S1 S2) => (fun _evar_0_ : forall (a : S1) (b : S2), (fun p : S1 * S2 => forall y : pairPoset S1 S2, p <== y -> (f1 \* f2) p <== (f1 \* f2) y) (a, b) => let (x, x0) as p return ((fun p0 : S1 * S2 => forall y : pairPoset S1 S2, p0 <== y -> (f1 \* f2) p0 <== (f1 \* f2) y) p) := __top_assumption_ in _evar_0_ x x0)...
fun_supM : forall (A : Type) (B : lattice) (s : Pred (A -> B)) (p : A -> B), (forall q : A -> B, q \In s -> q <== p) -> fun_sup s <== p
fun_limM : forall (A : Type) (B : cpo) (s : chain [posetofA -> B]) (x : [posetofA -> B]), (forall y : [posetofA -> B], y \In s -> y <== x) -> fun_lim s <== x
Ideal : forall (T : poset) (P id_val : T), id_val <== P -> ideal P
sub_supM : forall (T : lattice) (s : Pred T) (C : sup_closed s) (u : Pred (subPoset s)) (x : subPoset s), (forall y : subPoset s, y \In u -> y <== x) -> sub_sup C u <== x
Record mixin_of (T : poset) : Type := Mixin { mx_sup : Pred T -> T; _ : forall (s : Pred T) (x : T), x \In s -> x <== mx_sup s; _ : forall (s : Pred T) (x : T), (forall y : T, y \In s -> y <== x) -> mx_sup s <== x } Arguments Lattice.Mixin [T] [mx_sup]%function_scope (_ _)%function_scope
id_pf : forall (T : poset) (P : T) (i : ideal P), id_val i <== P
prop_supP : forall (s : Pred Prop) (p : Prop), p \In s -> p <== prop_sup s
